title: Fabian Massotto | Portfolio
name: Fabian Massotto
about: I am naturally curious and passionate about technology and innovation, devoted to keep learning every day. I love working in fast-paced and dynamic environments, with different cultures and backgrounds, where collaboration is key to success. A problem solver at heart, I approach challenging scenarios with a creative mindset and enjoy finding solutions.
